name: Math Flick
description:
Welcome to Math Flick! 

Math Flick is a fun game that aims to improve your hand-eye coordination, reflexes, and basic arithmetic.

In the game, you are our top space cadet. Your task is to collect star energy by solving the equation and finding the correct star.

Contributors are:

https://github.com/TYLPHE

https://github.com/xiaozhong21

https://github.com/Appletri
